column4: Can someone please look at my bug report and at least give me a workaround.  I'm getting desperate: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xorg/+bug/674112
if there is no work around in the bug report, one has not yet been released
what do you want from us ?
I would ust like a bit of help to eliminate the segmentation fault.  I've been screaming for help for over two months
ok - so how can we do that ?
yes, but even if I do, it's not going to "fix" it
you need to log a bug, and wait for it to be progressed, talking in here isn't going to get a patch released
ok, so you need to progress the bug
well, log a bug, provide feed back in it, work with the package maintainers
you don't want to be changing xorg versions
you want to be progressing the bug
someone else was in early with the same problem exactly
leprechau thank you guys a lot :)
don't do it
progress the bug with people who know what they are doing
if you can't even find the source - your out of your league, progess the bug with people who understand it
how do I progress a bug report?
as I told you earlier, log the bug, pass notes on it, chase the bug owner, find the package maintainers, push them to put a fix in place, get it filtered down the chain
a seg fault is not going to get fixed over night
accept it, push the bug hard and work on it
appreciated.  Thank you.
